summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of VOCT Healthcare Platform - all specifications verified and working correctly
passed_tests: Backend API health check (100% success rate - 10/10 endpoints)
Hero section displays VOCT branding only with no assessment button
Navigation header contains all required buttons (Book, Services, Join Us, Login)
Services section with Swiper.js carousel showing 6 service cards
Service card 3D flip animation working with 1.2s transition
CTA section positioned between Services and Assessment with 'Take Free Assessment' button
Assessment form 3-step progress stepper (Basic Info, Chief Complaint, Details)
Assessment Step 1: All required fields (Name, Age, Gender, City, Contact Number)
Assessment Step 2: 6 chief complaint options with icons
Assessment Step 3: Conditional questions based on selected complaint
FAQ section with 7 expandable questions and proper animations
Footer with VOCT branding, Quick Links, Services list, and Contact info
Login modal with phone/OTP flow and +91 prefix
OTP verification working with demo OTP system
Profile dropdown functionality (for existing users)
New user signup flow (for new phone numbers)
All UI elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Responsive design and proper styling with exact color codes
Remix Icons loaded correctly via CDN
Smooth scrolling and animations working properly

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (All UI flows, integrations, and specifications verified)
